title: Judge Medium Light Skin Tone
description: Represents a judge, someone who presides over legal proceedings and makes rulings.  Often associated with fairness, justice, and authority. This variation shows a medium-light skin tone.
apple_vendor_description: The judge emoji with a medium-light skin tone on Apple devices embodies impartiality and wisdom, depicted with Apple‚Äôs hallmark 3D depth and nuanced lighting. The figure is presented with a stern yet fair expression, their robe rendered with soft gradients and rounded edges that suggest gravitas and tradition. This emoji, as seen on Apple devices, represents justice, legal proceedings, and making a final decision, often used in contexts of fairness or judgment.
